name: flogo-aws-s3
title: Amazon S3
description: Upload or Download files from Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3)

settings.name: action
settings.description: The action you want to perform

settings.name: awsRegion
settings.description: The AWS region, uses environment setting by default

input.name: action
input.description: The action you want to perform

input.name: s3Location
input.description: The file location on S3, this should be a full path (like /bla/temp.txt)

input.name: localLocation
input.description: The localLocation is the full path to a file (like /bla/temp.txt) when uploading a file or the full path to a directory (like ./tmp) when downloading a file

input.name: s3NewLocation
input.description: The new file location on S3 of you want to copy a file, this should be a full path (like /bla/temp.txt)

output.name: result
output.description: The result will contain OK if the action was carried out successfully or will contain an error message
